domain.name: Political Body

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: You can't yell fire in a crowded theater when there isn't one. What about standing outside a burning building and refusing to pull the fire alarm? That's in essence what we've been getting on the coronavirus from the White House and Fox News for weeks.
